description.narrative: The Gateway Mall Project is a new US$37 million mall development comprising about 18,000 m2 gross lettable area in Lilongwe the capital city of Malawi. The mall will cater to both local and regional customers and will be anchored by major South African retailers as well as a number of key local retail players. The land was acquired from the Government of Malawi on a 99-year lease and the site is sufficiently large to include the potential for a 7,000 m2 extension of the mall and also has sufficient space for a 150 room hotel project to possibly be implemented at a later stage. Construction of the mall is earmarked to begin in May 2010 and occupation is planned for September 2011.
